name: Whedon API
description: The Whedon Bot for interacting with reviewers on JOSS, JOSE and other journals

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The name of this application on Heroku

HEROKU_CLI_USER.description: The username of the account used to run restart.sh

HEROKU_CLI_TOKEN.description: The API token of the account used to run restart.sh

JOSS_API_KEY.description: The API key for the JOSS site API

JOSE_API_KEY.description: The API key for the JOSE site API

JCON_API_KEY.description: The API key for the JCON site API

REDIS_PROVIDER.description: The expected REDIS environment variable name for Sidekiq (don't modify this)

CROSSREF_USERNAME.description: The username for depositing with Crossref

CROSSREF_PASSWORD.description: The password for depositing with Crossref

CROSSREF_EMAIL.description: The email used for the polite pool with Crossref search
